Description: The following statement contains a magic number: if (args.Length > 0)              {                  siteUrl = args[0];                  userName = args[1];                  foreach (var c in args[2].ToCharArray()) pwd.AppendChar(c);              }              else              {                  // Request Office365 site from the user                  siteUrl = GetSite();                    /* Prompt for Credentials */                  Console.WriteLine("Enter Credentials for {0}"' siteUrl);                    userName = GetUserName();                  pwd = GetPassword();              }
